bibl.title: Catalogue of a Collection of Coptic Ostraca in the Graeco-Roman Museum in Alexandria.
bibl.note: Summary presentation of 66 Coptic ostraca (some of them Coptic and Greek, one totally Greek). Most of the ostraca lack a provenance and are only recorded as "trouvé dans la réserve". - Preface. - Introduction. - Catalogue. - See in part. p. 303, No. 66: Tax-receipt (Greek), found in Batn Harît. Text edition by K.A. WORP is forthcoming.
bibl.seg: KUHN Magdalena, in Cooperation with Ahmed ABD EL-FATTAH, Catalogue of a Collection of Coptic Ostraca in the Graeco-Roman Museum in Alexandria.
Jean-Yves EMPEREUR (Éd.), Alexandrina. 3 = Études alexandrines. 18 (Le Caire, 2009) pp. 273-339, tabl., 66 figg.

Summary presentation of 66 Coptic ostraca (some of them Coptic and Greek, one totally Greek). Most of the ostraca lack a provenance and are only recorded as "trouvé dans la réserve". - Preface. - Introduction. - Catalogue. - See in part. p. 303, No. 66: Tax-receipt (Greek), found in Batn Harît. Text edition by K.A. WORP is forthcoming.
